name: Passion fruit martini
description: This easy passion fruit cocktail is bursting with zingy flavours and is perfect for celebrating with friends.
directions: Scoop the seeds from one of the passion fruits into the glass of a cocktail shaker, add the vodka, passoa, lime juice and sugar syrup.
Add a handful of ice and shake well, strain into 2 martini glasses, top up with prosecco, then add half a passion fruit to each.
